title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs to chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm, supporting Node.js and browser environments with fetch-based requests.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LangChain LLMs and embeddings for use in chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI), offering ChatGPT-like interface, model management, RAG, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama, providing fluent builders and POJOs to interact with the Ollama REST API from JVM languages.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI tool that wraps the Ollama API with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models, supporting inline suggestions and customizable prompts.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that sends selected text or buffers to Ollama for completion, explanation, or refactoring, displaying results in floating windows.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat application that connects to a local Ollama instance, providing a clean UI for multi-turn conversations and model switching.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with configurable models, PVC, and GPU node selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset, allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama models, supports slash commands, context windows, and per-guild model choice.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django REST API wrapper around Ollama, exposing endpoints for chat, completion, and model management with Swagger docs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama API using reqwest and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# client for Ollama with .NET 6+ support, offering both synchronous and asynchronous methods plus streaming chat.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets users query local Ollama models from within notes for summarization, brainstorming, or Q&A.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Lightweight Telegram bot leveraging Ollama for on-device inference, featuring group chat support and per-user model selection.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of community Modelfiles for Ollama, including fine-tunes, quantized versions, and niche domain experts.
